desc: THE GUESTLIST designs and produces some of the finest quality cashmere goods in Europe. With an ethical, slow fashion approach to production, we take the step past sustainability towards circularity. Available across Europe, the United Kingdom, and USA.

layout.text: THE GUESTLIST  knows that while each of us is here for a limited amount of time, our impacts are not. Both our actions and inactions have further-reaching effects than we know. It is therefore our responsibility, as proactive and participating guests on our earth, to ensure that our impacts progressively improve. Collaboration is the future - sustained, real improvement only becomes attainable when working outside of competition.
